body_html: If you pass in a non-broadcasting tensor to the library, does it switch to a broadcasting tensor? If it doesn't, you have the same issue of the library having to work with both (and having to define in what cases the flag is copied).
body_text: If you pass in a non-broadcasting tensor to the library, does it switch to a broadcasting tensor?  If it doesn't, you have the same issue of the library having to work with both (and having to define in what cases the flag is copied).
body: If you pass in a non-broadcasting tensor to the library, does it switch to a broadcasting tensor?  If it doesn't, you have the same issue of the library having to work with both (and having to define in what cases the flag is copied).
